Posted: 28 June, 2020
Early Access Review
								First off, a great aim trainer! Download and try it, how can't you go wrong it's free.I never used to aim train till I started play Apex Legends, I had even bought Kovaak 2.0: The Meta as well but I keep comping back to Aim Lab because how clean, user friendly, and easy it is to just load up and train. No bullThe best part of Aim Lab is the stat tracking, wow I fixed so many micro things I never knew I did, this thing told me I was looking at the bottom half of my screen too much. wtf??? Better then that, it taught me HOW to fix it, told me drills to do that help. AKA solutions, not just you do this, fix it.One criticism, I wish ALL the different modes there are were more pushed. You go under "Training" for the basic modes but "TASKS" on the bottom left brings up 30+ more training sims, its crazy but I didn't find this out till about 3 or 4 hours after playing and clicking around randomly. I can imagine someone playing and leaving not knowing.My favorite is the Pentakill mode, very fun to do after the core training is doneThis is hands down the best and its FREE.Thank you to Aim Lab team, you have helped me and my aim :)
